item.content:encoded:
Commodities Outlook

This Commodities Package is designed for investors who need commodity recommendations to find the best performing commodities in the industry. It includes 4 commodities with bullish or bearish signals indicating which are best to buy:

  • Top 2 commodities for the long position
  • Top 2 commodities for the short position
Package Name: Commodities
Recommended Positions: Long
Forecast Length: 14 Days (03/17/2017 - 03/31/2017)
I Know First Average: 1.70%
Several predictions in this short-term 14 Days forecast saw significant returns. The algorithm had correctly predicted 2 out 2 stock movements. GLD was the top performing prediction with a return of 1.70%. XAU and DUMMY saw outstanding returns of 1.70% and 0.00%. The package had an overall average return of 1.70% during the period. GLD, is the spot price of gold as traded for futures and or forward contracts. Algorithmic traders utilize these daily forecasts by the I Know First market prediction system as a tool to enhance portfolio performance, verify their own analysis and act on market opportunities faster. item.title: Daily Stock Market Forecast Based on Artificial Intelligence: Returns up to 35.21% in 3 Days
item.dc:creator: Dario
item.content:encoded:
Daily Stock Market Forecast

An insider is legally permitted to buy and sell shares of the firm – and any subsidiaries – that employs him or her. However, these transactions must be properly registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and are done with advance filings. You can find details of this type of insider trading on the SEC's EDGAR database. This algorithmic forecast is for stocks with recently reported insiders' transactions.An "insider" is any person who possesses at least one of the following:

  • access to valuable non-public information about a corporation (for example a company's directors and high-level executives)
  • ownership of more than 10% of the company's equity
Package Name: Insiders Stocks
Forecast Length: 3 Days (03/27/2017 - 03/30/2017)
I Know First Average: 5.55%
In this 3 Days forecast for the Insiders Stocks Package, there were many high performing trades and the algorithm correctly predicted 10 out 10 stocks. The top-performing prediction in this forecast was OMER, which registered a return of 35.21%. Other notable stocks were CRAY and NKTR with a return of 4.04% and 3.70%. The package had an overall average return of 5.55%, providing investors with a premium of 4.52% over the S&P 500’s return of 1.03% during the same period. Omeros Corporation (OMER), is a biopharmaceutical company, that discovers, develops, and commercializes small-molecule and protein therapeutics, and orphan indications. item.title: Best Energy Sector Stocks Based on Artificial Intelligence: Returns up to 180.83% in 1 Year
item.dc:creator: Dario
item.content:encoded:
Best Energy Sector Stocks

The Energy Stocks Package is based on the I Know First algorithm and is designed for investors and analysts who need recommendations for the best performing stocks for the whole Energy Industry. It includes 20 stocks with bullish and bearish signals and indicates the best energy stocks to buy and sell:

  • Top 10 Energy stocks for the long position
  • Top 10 Energy stocks for the short position
Package Name: Energy Stocks
Recommended Positions: Long
Forecast Length: 1 Year (03/30/2016 - 03/30/2017)
I Know First Average: 61.17%
I Know First’s State of the Art Algorithm accurately forecasted 8 out of 10 trades in this Energy Stocks Package for the 1 Year time period. The greatest return came from HNR at 180.83%. CLF and VALE also performed well for this time horizon with returns of 174.75% and 132.94%, respectively. The package itself saw an overall return of 61.17%, providing investors with a 45.94% premium above the S&P 500’s return of 15.23% for the same time period. Harvest Natural Resources Inc (HNR)., an independent energy company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, production, and disposition of oil and natural gas properties. It primarily holds interests in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela; and a 66.667 percent interest in the exploration acreage offshore of the Republic of Gabon. As of December 31, 2015, the company, through its 20.4 percent interest in Petrodelta, S.A. had delivered approximately 14.8 MBls of oil and 3.9 billion cubic feet of natural gas. Harvest Natural Resources Inc (HNR). was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
